text: Tamen [wo de pu renmen] qingting shan yan [ru “chu an la wai, zai meiyouying shou chongbai de zhu” deng] bing zunxing qi zui hao de [ru ren zhu du yi, bu chongbai ouxiang deng]. Zhexie ren que shi an la suo yindao de ren, zhexie ren que shi you lizhi de ren [ru zai de•ben•a mu er•ben•nu fa lei, sa lei man•fa er xi he ai bu•zai er•ji fa li deng].
